name: Underhero
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/573320/extras/UHTrailerbit.gif?t=1635272576[/img][h2]DESCRIPTION:[/h2]
[b]Underhero[/b] is a 2D side-scroller RPG adventure game with turn-based combat… without the turns! Precisely timed actions are your most powerful weapons. It tells an intriguing and mysterious story, full of silly characters brimming with personality, quirky dialogue, and lots of weird humor.[h2]STORY:[/h2]
Inspired by Paper Mario and other Nintendo RPGs. It tells the story of a world where the chosen hero has failed and an underling of the main villain takes his place as the new “hero”. 
Join Elizabeth IV and the little Masked Kid as they journey across the Chestnut Kingdom to defeat your evil boss, Mr. Stitches! Meet friends, foes and other weird characters in the mysterious world of Underhero.[h2]FEATURES:[/h2]
[list][li]    Turn-based combat with a twist: [b]there are no turns![/b] Use your reflexes to [b]evade,[/b] and your timing to [b]attack[/b] or [b]parry![/b] We call it timing-based combat.
[/li][li]    A sidescrolling RPG adventure full of beautiful pixel art and cartoony aesthetics.
[/li][li]    A wonderful original soundtrack composed by [b]Stijn van Wakeren.[/b]
[/li][li]    Enemies consider you their ally, so talk to them in-battles for tips, jokes, and lore!
[/li][li]    Hit enemies with the beat of the music for Groovy~ critical hits!  
[/li][li]    Explore worlds sprinkled with many hidden secrets.
[/li][li]    Fun and intense boss battles!
[/li][li] A story shrouded in mystery, with many twists and turns…[/li][/list]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/573320/extras/kid.png?t=1635272576[/img]

[b]**Seizure Warning**[/b]
Certain moments in the game contain flashing lights and/or imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy.
detail:
名称: Underhero
类型: 冒险, 独立, 角色扮演
开发商: Paper Castle Games
发行商: Paper Castle Games
发行日期: 2018 年 9 月 19 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (642) - 此游戏的 642 篇用户评测中有 91% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (642 篇中的 91%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7
处理器: Intel Core i3 / AMD Quad-Core Processor A6
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: 512MB VRAM, EVGA GeForce 210 DDR3,  ASUS AMD HD 5450, Intel HD Graphics 2000
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX Compatible
附注事项: 64-bit and 32-bit systems supported.
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: MAC OS X 10.11.6 or higher
处理器: 2.33 GHz or faster processor
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: 512 MB display memory
存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 12.04+ / Steam OS+
处理器: Intel Core i3 / AMD Quad-Core Processor A6
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: 512 MB display memory
存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
